* The buttons up Beside the power button is tested and work P( make open what I want),e make open anithing I want) web button open Firefox ,mail button open Thunderbird Mail ,this button tested with KeyTouch version 2.2

==== Pros ====

* For Installation I used the Ubuntu 7.04 Feisty Fawn DVD desktop installation (with safe graphics mode)
* Intel Pentium M760 works fine (install the 2.6.20-15-generic kernel packages)
* OpenGL vendor string: ATI Technologies Inc.
* OpenGL renderer string: MOBILITY RADEON X700 Generic
* OpenGL version string: 2.0.5814 (8.25.18)
* laptop:~$ fgl_glxgears ( Using GLX_SGIX_pbuffer ,2983 frames in 5.0 seconds = 596.600 FPS ,3220 frames in 5.0 seconds = 644.000 FPS,3193 frames in 5.0 seconds = 638.600 FPS ,3325 frames in 5.0 seconds = 665.000 FPS ,3316 frames in 5.0 seconds = 663.200 FPS )

==== Pros ====

* For Installation I used the Dapper Drake DVD desktop installation (with safe graphics mode)
* Intel Pentium M760 works fine (install the linux-386 kernel packages)
* OpenGL vendor string: ATI Technologies Inc.
* OpenGL renderer string: MOBILITY RADEON X700 Generic
* OpenGL version string: 2.0.5814 (8.25.18)
